channel.title: 718 How to make a forum for your website and how to make a player an extreme don
channel.description: Hey guys I'm making a private server with matrix 718/742 caches and i was wondering how do you make and existing player a donator or and extreme donator, is it in "user.p"? if so please tell me how to do it so and also how do you make a forum page for your website?

item.title: 718 How to make a forum for your website and how to make a player an extreme don
item.dc:creator: @fuckyourself fuckyourself
item.description:
@fuckyourself wrote:

Its Not Okay:

Hey guys I’m making a private server with matrix 718/742 caches and i was wondering how do you make and existing player a donator or and extreme donator, is it in “user.p”? if so please tell me how to do it so and also how do you make a forum page for your website?

To make a player donator, month donator or Extreme donator simply use ;;monthdonator ;;permdonator or ;;permextremedonator player name

Read full topic
item.source: 718 How to make a forum for your website and how to make a player an extreme don
